channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here's what Trump's plans to extend his tax cuts could mean for you
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has said he wants to extend the 2017 tax cuts, plus throw in a few more. Here's what to know.

item.title: How D.C. tackled a child care crunch through a tax hike on the rich
item.description: In Washington, D.C., a tax on residents earning more than $250,000 a year is boosting the wages of child care workers. Two years in, it's proving to b...

item.title: A nonprofit leader, a social worker: Here are the stories of the people on Biden’s clemency list
item.description: Among the roughly 1,500 people whose sentences were commuted or who were pardoned by President Joe Biden are a nonprofit leader who supports at-risk y...

item.title: Here's when, where the Geminid meteor shower will be visible during peak
item.description: One of the best meteor showers of the year is about to peak. Here's how to watch and where you can catch the Geminids.

item.title: Here are the deadlines for mailing your holiday gifts to ensure they arrive on time
item.description: Mail carriers and shipping companies will be closed on Christmas Day.

item.title: Back trouble and brain fog bothered suspect in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing, his posts show
Russia targets Ukrainian infrastructure with widespread aerial strikes
item.description: Russia launched a massive aerial attack against Ukraine on Friday as Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy described it as one of the heaviest bomba...

item.title: Former anti-narcotics chief known as "Macho" extradited to U.S.
item.description: The U.S. State Department offered a reward of up to $5 million for information leading to Maximiliano Dávila's conviction.

item.title: Steven Bartlett sharing harmful health misinformation in Diary of CEO podcast
item.description: Disproven health claims are accepted with little challenge by host on number one podcast, BBC investigation finds.

item.title: Why the toy aisle is where to find this year's hottest gifts for adults
item.description: The most sought-after gifts for adults this year might be in the kids' toy aisle. Here's why toys are sparking joy among older generations.

item.title: Explained: India's controversial Places of Worship law
item.description: India's top court is hearing petitions against a1991 law that protects the character of religious places.

item.title: Former Syria prison head charged with torture in US
item.description: Samir Ousman Alsheikh is accused of torturing and ordering the torture of prisoners at Adra Prison.

item.title: The Indian teen who became the world's youngest chess champion
item.description: On Thursday Gukesh Dommaraju became the youngest world champion at the age of 18.

item.title: McDonald’s employee who called 911 in CEO’s shooting is eligible for a reward, but it will take time
Macron meets centrist Bayrou ahead of imminent decision on next French PM
item.description: Macron is seeking to restore political stability after Michel Barnier was ousted nine days ago.

item.title: For kids with rare genetic disorders, customized CRISPR treatments offer hope
item.description: The gene-editing technique is effective for treating some illnesses but it's been too expensive to consider it for rare conditions. A new approach in ...

item.title: How much do you remember about 2024? What does 2025 hold? Find out in the quiz
item.description: Who or what died? Who or what broke up? Why so many bears? And what color IS "brat green," anyway? Test yourself in this year's final news quiz.

item.title: When you can see the Cold Moon, 2024's final full moon
item.description: December's full moon, known as the Cold Moon, is the last full moon of 2024. Here's when it peaks and why it's called the Cold Moon.
